rComments: One of the the best professors i've had on this campus. Her midterms and final weren't easy but she is super generous with the points she gives. If you go to class, pay attention, and study it's hard not to do well in her class. Also check out her office hours, very easy to approach.

She started off with an insanely long first midterm but eased off as the quarter went on. She gives a lot of homework but it's definitely doable. Midterms were fair and if she taught another physics class, I would consider taking it.
